    cognitivemapr analysis functions Tutorial Preprocessing Edge and Nodelists

    rutte_p2_edgelist

    rutte_p2_edgelist.Rd

    This dataset consists of an edgelist with causal and utility relations derived from speeches by the Dutch prime-minister Mark Rutte on the Eurozone crisis from the period from 2nd May 2010 to 26th July 2012.

    Usage

    rutte_p2_edgelist

    Format

    A data frame with 106 rows and 10 variables:

    from

    num numerical id for the cause concept

    to

    num numerical id for the effect concept

    weight

    num number of times the relation is mentioned (can have any number)

    edge_value

    num sign/value of the relation: can be 1 (positive relation), -1 (negative relation), or 0 (non-existent relation)

    edge_id

    num unique numerical id for the edge/relation

    map_id

    num numerical id for this cognitive map

    map_date

    Date the date of the speech from which the relation was derived

    speaker

    chr name of the actor from whose assertions the edgelist was derived

    value.x

    num the evaluation (pos, neg ambiguous) of the 'from' concept

    value.y

    num the evaluation (pos, neg ambiguous) of the 'to' concept

    Source

    ain of ideational policy studies. Journal of European Public Policy, 31(2), 428–451. https://doi.org/10.1080/13501763.2022.2155215

    The variables are as follows:
